limiters.description: List of limiters to be applied

key.description: The user key corresponding to the limiter object. This must be unique in the scope.

conn.description: The maximum number of concurrent requests allowed

burst.description: The number of excessive concurrent requests (or connections) allowed to be delayed

delay.description: The default processing latency of a typical connection (or request)

key.description: The user key corresponding to the limiter object. This must be unique in the scope.

rate.description: The specified request rate (number per second) threshold

burst.description: The number of excessive requests per second allowed to be delayed

key.description: The user key corresponding to the limiter object. This must be unique in the scope.

count.description: The specified number of requests threshold

window.description: The time window in seconds before the request count is reset

status_code_rejected.description: The status code when requests over the limit, default 429

logging_only.description: If true, the request goes through when there is some issue with rate limiting, default false
